Essential Road Maintenance Training Program Ley Choon Training Courses Our Learning & Development (L&D) team curates a range of targeted Training programs. These programs cater to both upskilling and reskilling, ensuring that employees stay competitive and adaptable in an ever-evolving industry. Whether enhancing existing skills or acquiring new ones, our training programs prioritize workforce development to foster personal growth, operational efficiency, and innovation. This holistic approach allows us to build a robust talent pipeline while preparing the workforce to meet future business demands.
